DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial evaluate efficacy IV acetaminophen versus IV ibuprofen closing hemodynamically significant patent ductus arteriosus preterm infant .
DOC.criteria: preterm infant 2330 week gestation , PDA require treatment infection , congenital heart disease , genetic syndrome , NEC , pulmonary hypertension , hydrops , intestinal perforation , grade 3 4 IVH , serum creatinine > 1.5 , previous treatment COX inhibitor .
